author: cziegeler
msg: SLING-295: Apply patch from Tobias Bocanegra for
- altered deepGetOrCreateNode() to use jcr:primaryType and jcr:mixinType props
- simplified RequestProperty to be less intelligent. always has an 'abs path'
- added test cases for (deep) node creation with node types

author: dhruba
msg: HADOOP-2912. MiniDFSCluster restart should wait for namenode to exit
safemode. This was causing TestFsck to fail.  (Mahadev Konar via dhruba)

author: billbarker
msg: I have way too few spare cycles for this at the moment.
It looks like the good patch is pretty simple, but there are those cycles again.  So, I'm not going to continue blocking the s*cky patch any longer.
